name: zais.github.io
body:
### Gteetings: I'm humble IT guy, interested in Mac/Linux and Gaming :).
I don't like Windows only software/games. ### Projects: * [SteamLA](steam_library_analyzer): Simple Steam Library Analyzer written on shell (no-gui obviously) * [PMPcli](pmpcli): Quite hacky and ugly tool to work with PMP from terminal
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
